description: This file contains a JavaScript module that defines underscore.js's template system, initializes Google Analytics, and includes functions for fetching files and issues, as well as a Learn class for dynamic content insertion related to a TodoMVC example.

classes.name: Learn
classes.description: A class for managing and displaying learning content and issue counts related to the TodoMVC framework.

methods.name: Learn.prototype.append
methods.description: Inserts a dynamically generated aside element with framework information into the DOM.

methods.name: Learn.prototype.fetchIssueCount
methods.description: Fetches and displays the number of open issues from GitHub for the project.
